subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald put himself in position to regain the world’s No. 1 ranking, shooting a three-under 69 to take a two-stroke lead after the third round of the British PGA Championship in England.
snippet: Luke Donald put himself in position to regain the world’s No. 1 ranking, shooting a three-under 69 to take a two-stroke lead after the third round of the British PGA Championship in England.
